item.title: Fix broken translation management entry in TOC
Add PlanetScale
item.description: https://planetscale.com/ - PlanetScale is a MySQL compatible, serverless database platform powered by Vitess, 3 databases for free with 10GB storage, 100 Million rows read/mo per database, and 10 Million rows written/mo per database.

item.title: Added Chpokify
item.description: https://chpokify.com/ - Teams based Planning Poker that saves time of sprint estimation. Free up to 5 users, free Jira integrations, unlimited video calls, unlimited teams, unlimited sessions.

item.title: README.md
item.description: https://hottempmail.com/ - Unlimited free temp email or disposable temporary email addresses. Autoexpire in one days.

item.title: Returned Zoho Assist to its original place
item.description:
https://zoho.com/assist - Customer Support management with 3 agents and private knowledge base, email tickets. Integrates with [Assist](https://zoho.com/assist) for 1 remote technician & 5 unattended computers.
https://guacamole.apache.org/ - — Open source clientless remote desktop gateway

item.title: Update description of Apify in README.md
item.description: https://www.apify.com/ - Web scraping and automation platform to create an API for any website and extract data. Ready-made scrapers, integrated proxies, and custom solutions. Free plan with $5 platform credits included every month.
